"Bring the world's most popular language learning platform to your classroom."
Share your learning progress with a teacher, using their 6-letter classroom code. They’ll be able to give assignments and see what you’ve learned in a dashboard.
You’ve reached the maximum level in %s!
"But brains aren't perfect. Over time the strength will decay as you forget words."
The skill %s is at full strength!
Keep those strength bars full as words fade from your memory.
Reach Level 1 in all skills above to unlock this!
"You'll now be able to recall this skill more quickly and accurately from your brain"
"You'll now be able to recall these skills more quickly and accurately from your brain"

New lessons have been added to these skills.
